reviewText: I thought that this dvd was a video dvd, with Barrys image on it, but it turns out that it is only a dvd just like the cd  A Christmas Gift Of Love. The scenes were supposed to move on the dvd but I couldn't get them to move. This is not a good dvd,
Barry is the best!  The scenes are beautiful in this DVD and of course, Barry's music is perfection.  Love it!

I have this collection of Barry Christmas songs from a previously released Barry Christmas CD and it is a great collection.  That CD is inside the box shown, if you recognize it.  I do not have this video format, but wanted to let you know the music is wonderful.

I have seen this DVD offered in a store and it shows 3 winter scenes.  The scenes are pictured at the bottom of the cover.  I have seen a similar DVD used at a social gathering to give the party ambiance.  Of course, it's much better with background music (Barry).
